title: New Soderbergh movie shot entirely on iPhone premieres in Berlin
text:
New Soderbergh movie shot entirely on iPhone premieres in Berlin 9:24pm IST - 01:23 
Actress Claire Foy talks about making smartphone film 'Unsane' at the film's world premiere at the Berlin film festival. (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
